My Learning Process

Being a newer developer is a constant struggle to learn and stay up to date with the latest trends. Here is the general path I take for tackling learning new skills.

1

Read Documentation

I research new technologies and closely review documentation to understand how each language/library works on a fundamental level

2

Planning A Learning Path

I try to figure out a path of learning that will lead to me best understanding how the technology is utilized (Udemy course, making small applications, adding to previous applications)

3

Developing Skills

Once I have decided how I think I can efficiently obtain the skillset I'm after, I get to work creating new content that will build my knowledge

4

Feedback

Once I've finished my task, I try to gain feedback through other devlopers using online platforms or people I went to school with to see if there are any ways I can improve or build upon my newfound knowledge
